extendedInfo.description: Speed hikers are racing on the mountain. But running is not fast enough, hikers have to fly!All of the magic is GRAVITY.The gravity increases when screen is touched, and it restores to normal when released.The game rule is very simple, but how fast hikers run will completey depend on your skill.Some tips may be helpful:# Touch to acclerate speed on declivity.# Release to make hikers fly on acclivity.# Fine tuning gravity when hikers are flying.# BOOST is very helpful when you fall behind.Good luck of your trip!

reviews.title: Fun addictive game
reviews.comment: Must give it a shot. Love the race mode. Need to track best time would be nice..
reviews.author: Hsing Liang

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This game is great! Fun and addicting. I just wish ther was a faster way to get crystals.
reviews.author: Desmond Johnson

reviews.title: As good as angry birds!
reviews.comment: Lots of fun! You compete with real people so the experience is very versatile!
reviews.author: Cole Panike

reviews.title: Good but  :(
reviews.comment: Very good game and addicting and got to ninja and he was maxed and i had to delete the game and i did and then installed it and had nothing but im not gonna rate it lower than 4
reviews.author: ivette Chavez

reviews.title: Awesome. Great mechanics and fair upgrade system
reviews.comment: It would be awesome if there was a chat feature or voice chat to speak to the other players. An invite system and a friends list would be awesome as well. You could see who you know while youre racing becauae their names could be above their head. All in all great game but it could be so much better.
reviews.author: Eric Brown

reviews.title: What an awesome game
reviews.comment: Excellent game.  But i do wish the devs would update it.   Its like they\'ve just forgot about it. Needs new courses.   A scoreboard type thing that could track your progress against others.  A way to customize characters (colors if nothing else).  And ability to win crystals a little easier.  Currently its nearly impossible to win your way to all of your upgrades.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wood
reviews.comment: This has to be the best game I have found for my phone yet! I spend almost all my free time racing.  So addictive once you get good and build up your guy. I have recommended it to my friends and recommend it to everyone. Ya you might fall through the boosts sometimes but don\'t ever rely on them and you\'ll be flying like Superman all day!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Fun. But, repetitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freeta is mad!
reviews.comment: I seriously do not know how to run could anyone please leave a comment on how to?thx love freeta
reviews.author: Freeta Jone

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Super fun, great update to the moon jump game, but I wonder if the creator blatantly ripped it off?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: fun definitely worth playing.
reviews.author: Chad Roberts

reviews.comment: Too many glitches! Why are there so many glitches?!It is a good game,but improve the game droidhen!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super adductive game
reviews.comment: Super game need few more fetature Like speedometer and can also have the name of country of players. Now i am decrease one star because some time when i jump on boost power it does not work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Owsome
reviews.comment: This a very addictive game you\'ll keep playing and playing I very much recommend this game for every body just play! And stop playing.
reviews.author: Jerrius Brown

reviews.title: Good game overall
reviews.comment: Thus game is pretty fun for many hours. Worth the $2 to buy crystals for an initial boost towards buying the ninja.   Please add some metrics to the upgrades, so we know exactly what we are going from and getting to (e.g. +4% speed, etc)  Please make three big ramp interact the same as other ramps and not act as an instant acceleration pad. Thus is punishing to players who are ahead, but happen to be on the way up from a big swing just as the hill appears.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: nice game play,simple but funny...
reviews.author: den Pangestu

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I wish u could earn more crystals when u win a race!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Great game because it\'s a very simple game.
reviews.author: C Green

reviews.title: Hella Fun!
reviews.comment: This game is not only addictive but it also doesn\'t get boring. I play it in my spare time at work while I commute because I carpool so time goes by faster. It\'s too bad that it doesn\'t keep stat records though. I want to see my win/loss %. Naming my profile is funny too.
reviews.author: Daniel Ortiz-Ulloa

reviews.title: speed hiker
reviews.comment: good game
reviews.author: A Google User
